WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS 1000Z TO 2000Z DAILY
   12 SEP THRU 12 OCT BY M/V SILENCIO IV IN:
   A. 21-50.27S 040-47.80W.
   B. 21-49.83S 040-50.13W.
   C. 21-49.83S 040-51.33W.
   D. 21-47.52S 040-59.28W.
   E. 21-47.85S 040-58.28W.
   F. 21-49.70S 040-58.50W.
   G. 21-50.55S 040-48.70W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 122100Z OCT 22.
